#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
 
int min=2147483647,max,x,n,q;
 
int main() {
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&q);
	for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) {
		scanf("%d",&x);
		if(x>max) max=x;
		if(x<min) min=x;
	}
	while (q--) {
		scanf("%d",&x);
		if(x<=max && x>=min) puts("Yes");
		else puts("No");
	}
	return 0;
}
